resources.string: enter a title for the subject

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: The official currency of Kuwait is the Kuwaiti riyal?
Toubkal is the highest peak in the Arab world?
Algeria is the largest Arab country in terms of area?
Casablanca is the capital of Morocco
Kabul is the capital of Afghanistan?
The biggest invertebrate animal is the jellyfish?
The Arab country with which the Equator passes is Sudan?
The heart is the largest organ of the human body?
The first mosque in Islam is the Prophet\'s Mosque?
The only uncle of your aunt\'s children is your father?
The world\'s first banana production country is Ecuador?
The capital of Argentina is Baku?
Vietnam\'s currency is Dong?
Damascus is the capital of Syria
